examples: he ate his fill of potatoes
she had heard her fill of gossip

definitions.text: any material that fills a space or container
examples: there was not enough fill for the trench

definitions.text: make full, also in a metaphorical sense

examples: The pool slowly filled with water

definitions.text: assume, as of positions or roles
examples: She took the job as director of development
he occupies the position of manager
the young prince will soon occupy the throne

definitions.text: fill or meet a want or need
appoint someone to (a position or a job)
